ComicInfo.Summary:
Issue # 1/2 ' Cigarettes and Alcohol.'
Powerhaus, Evo, Frostbite, Copycat and Sublime gather around a table to share their strangest, ugliest personal experiences and the one with the lousiest story is set to drink a punch bowl full of unmentionable liquids and substances. Basist on true story tales of strange deaths and horrid road trips, the kids divulge on stranger than fiction stories until Sideways Bob arrives on scene to tell a few sick stories of his own....
